frontMatter.title: DICE CTF 2022 – vm-calc
frontMatter.summary: Pollute prototype with a recent vulerability in console.table, and throw a proxy object within an exception.

prev.title: Cyber Grabs CTF 0x03 – boot2root
prev.summary: Bruteforce Jenkins login page with a wordlist we find leading to system access and proceeding by escalating to Root
